document_data.name: Find Direction
document_data.mainbody: '''''Find direction''''' was a common [[divination]] spell used by [[ninja]]s. The spell was very rare outside [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell gave a ninja a temporary sense of direction, allowing them to find their position in relation to the cardinal points. For example, a lost ninja could cast this spell to find in what direction true north was. The spell functioned in all environments, such as underground. [[Lodestone]]s did not have an affect on the spell.
document_data.Components: The spell required only a [[somatic component|somatic]] component, [[kuji-kiri]] hand gestures.
